segments.text: Hey , Devi , have you thought about where would you like to go to dinner on Friday for your birthday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not sure . I don't know that many restaurants around here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , we could look online at the local Internet sites .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of food would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I enjoy Thai or Japanese the best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yes , I've heard of that one . Everyone I've spoken with says that it is great !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to go there then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that that would be a really good choice ! Let's call and make a reservation .
segments.speaker: S2
